nodes.text: Jayse was an individual who opined to Yarvok, a Nova Blades lieutenant, that he should be thankful everyone ended up alive when a ship carrying Yarvok's beast wrangler Krupo and Yarvok's pets crashed on the planet Dantooine.

Jayse was mentioned in the Codex entry for Invasive Species on Dantooine in the 2019 expansion Onslaught to the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare.
